main_block.title: Reseller Program
main_block.description: This is the easiest way to start Your business from scratch. We offer terms to sell our services under Your own brand! No hidden pitfalls.

services_description_block.title: Special Conditions
services_description_block.description: We will individually tailor a discount plan for all major types of our services. More turnover means more discounts!

services_description_block.title: Branding
services_description_block.description: You can completely conceal any association of Your services with our hosting. It's White Label, baby!

services_description_block.title: 24/7 Support
services_description_block.description: You will receive a dedicated 24/7 support channel to address any partner-related inquiries.

services_description_block.title: High Security
services_description_block.description: We guarantee the security of Your clients' data by using modern protection protocols.

resellers_text_block.title: We are glad to welcome our partners
resellers_text_block.description: Start growing Your business together with SpaceCore! We offer incredibly favorable conditions for our resellers and modern technological solutions, accompanied by a dedicated support channel and an individual approach to each partner.

faqItems.question: Where to start? How to set everything up?
faqItems.answerTitle: Where to start? How to set everything up?
faqItems.answerDescription: We are always ready to guide you on how to correctly configure Your products for cooperation with us. Feel free to contact our support service!⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ To start, you need to install Your own BILLmanager software. Upon request, we can provide you with a server at a good discount. All the basic information is mentioned in our article (link).

faqItems.question: Who can become a reseller?
faqItems.answerDescription: Whether it's a web studio, an online school, or even another hosting project — in reality, there are no restrictions! The key point is strict compliance with the terms of the partnership agreement. If Your activity does not violate our rules, we eagerly await the start of our cooperation!

faqItems.question: How to effectively sell my services?
faqItems.answerTitle: How to effectively sell my services?
faqItems.answerDescription: By default, we offer two main methods of selling services — Manual and Automatic. In the first case, all orders are under Your direct control. The automatic method means that all processes occur without Your involvement. For most of our services, an automatic processing method is available, which is truly convenient!

faqItems.question: How much can I earn as a reseller?
faqItems.answerTitle: How much can I earn as a reseller?
faqItems.answerDescription: Let's consider a real case example of 'Level 2': There is a VPS X tariff, which costs you 20 euros/month with a 15% discount. Suppose you set a markup of 30%, making the tariff cost 26 euros/month on Your hosting. You start promoting Your hosting and find 15 customers who purchase this tariff and renew it for 12 months. Thus, Your monthly income per customer will be 26 € - 20 € = 6 €. After a year, for 15 such servers, you will receive 6 € * 15 units * 12 months = 1080 € net income.

faqItems.question: How can I receive my profits?
faqItems.answerTitle: How can I receive my profits?
faqItems.answerDescription: We provide the option to credit Your earnings to Your personal account balance (minimum - 3 €) or withdraw funds to Your bank card or cryptocurrency wallet (minimum - 10 €).

faqItems.question: What kind of support do you provide to resellers?
faqItems.answerTitle: What kind of support do you provide to resellers?
faqItems.answerDescription: For each partner, we provide a dedicated 24/7 support channel where our specialists are always ready to assist in resolving any technical issues.
